attributes.action: Please support our campaign to make Winterhay Lane and Green Lane a Bridleway.
attributes.additional_details: We would like the Government to make Winterhay Lane and Green Lane in Ilminster Somerset a Bridleway.  This would create a right of way on foot, horseback and pedal cycle which allows free access to Green Lane, the River Isle, Eames' Mill and access from Home Farm Way to Winterhay Lane.
